short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send personalized WhatsApp messages in bulk, manage templates, auto-reply, and analyze performance, all in one extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OnTheGo is a powerful Chrome extension for sending bulk WhatsApp messages with attachments, creating message templates, and setting automated replies. It features an AI chat assistant, detailed user reports, and supports both Arabic and English interfaces. Enhance your marketing and customer engagement seamlessly with OnTheGo's advanced tools and intuitive design.
